title: 17RP short of leona
body: Hi, This is a league fan and i was just wondering if it is possible to receive an extra 17 RP as Leona is on sale this week and i am just short of buying her. I know this is somewhat of a large request but if possible it will make my day. Thank you - Regards FrostScythe

replies.body: Draw a nice picture in paint and send it to Riot asking for 17 RP through support ticket.
I am not great with paint, do you think they will accept something, a little below average?
Rule 1 of lol. NEVER buy champs with real money.
